name: Amulet of Nyrac
description:
7DRL 2023 Submission


Traverse the Dungeon
Your goal is to find the lost Amulet of Nyrac (neer-ack), an immense source of Arcana. Fight through the depths, utilizing anything you find to help you. Try to nab as much gold as you can while you're in there.

Controls
Mouse - Click buttons/items
WASD - Movement
E - Inventory
Space - Pickup items, go down stairs
ESC - Close opened windows

Made with SadConsole (C#). Special thanks to the SadConsole Discord (Thraka, Chris, Venomaus) for helping me learn how to work with SadConsole.

Started 03/04 - Finished 03/11
I'll probably continue and improve upon this game after the jam. This version is just a very simplistic working version.

Icon by Freepik - Flaticon
Font is a modified version of Andux_slepinir
